Reviews.Title: Good computer
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Great deal, good computer, good sound and screen, long battery life.  Would buy another.  Outdoes the HPs I have had in the past especially in sound quality from speakers.

Reviews.Title: it is good!
Reviews.Author: Papadopol Marius
Reviews.Content: it is usefull and for what i need it is ok, i hope to use it for a long time!
